column5: Thats it.  Still searching for the monsters in the GTA. Off to another location tomorrow.  dsn
That'sa pretty nice Goldfish ya caught there!
Awe shucks. Those fish are too pretty. You just can't catch carp as ugly and fat as me anymore.  The swimming bulldogs I like to call them.  Keep at 'em.
Hey DSN, I tried sending you a PM yesterday but your personal messenger is disabled. Found a spot you might wanna try out.

Good job dsn - still the GTA carp king.  Nice action shots.  How you don't lose more fish though while you're taking the photos I will never know LOL.  I tried to PM you too but MJL explained why I couldn't - totally understand your reasons.  Good luck with the pollen allergies too. I might try the islands tomorrow after work - still trying for my first carp of the year.  007
You must be using new equipment to be able to haul them in and take pictures at the same time. Got rid of the ugly stick?
still going at it eh  ... i need to find some time to get out this week ... and hopefully i'll have a report to post soon
i see that your still using the ugly stik
Nice carp!  Even though it was "short", the pics fill in where the words didn't.  I love your pics in your reports!
yikes only two posts and you know I have an Uglystick? Word must get around quick. LOL   dsn
Sorry but it isn't the uglystick as of yet. Its the Shimano EXAGE S.T.C.TE I'll only use the Uglystick when fishing for the bigger carp at the island.   dsn
